mapper.select: SELECT exercise_seq as exerciseSeq, exercise_name as exerciseName, exercise_image as exerciseImage FROM exercise
SELECT test_result_seq as testResultSeq, user_seq as userSeq, exercise_seq as exerciseSeq, date_format(test_date, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') as testDate FROM test_result WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq}
SELECT favorite_videos_seq as favoriteVideosSeq, user_seq as userSeq, video_url as videoUrl, video_title as videoTitle FROM favorite_videos WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq}
SELECT favorite_exercises_seq as favoriteExercisesSeq, exercise_seq as exerciseSeq, user_seq userSeq FROM favorite_exercises
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite_videos (user_seq, video_url, video_title) VALUES(#{userSeq}, #{videoUrl}, #{videoTitle})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorite_videos WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq} AND video_url=#{videoUrl}
DELETE FROM favorite_exercises WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq} AND exercise_seq=#{exerciseSeq}
DELETE FROM test_result WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq} AND test_result_seq=#{testResultSeq}
